alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Magoffin; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Breathitt, west central Magoffin, northeastern Lee and southern Wolfe Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Williba, or 7 miles south of Campton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Widecreek, Mary and Vortex around 415 PM EDT. War Creek and Lane around 420 PM EDT. Pence, Bethany, Lawson, Hollonville and Gentry around 425 PM EDT. Wilhurst, Vancleve, Fivemile, Frozen Creek, Paxton, Elkatawa, Malaga and Lexie around 430 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Jackson, Simpson, Sewell, Keck, Upper Gilmore, Gilmore, Taulbee, Moct, Shockey, Rosefork, Noctor, Lee City, Rock Lick, Mountain Valley, Bays, Stevenson, Rousseau, Haginsville, Burkhart, Dale, Belknap and Cutuno. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
